Cost of Freedom

A Collective Inquiry

The Book : Collective Memory | OPENING: FREEDOM | ARCHITECTONICS OF POWER | AFFORDANCES | Epilogue : Credits

AFFORDANCES

Nature, structure, motivations and limitations of some fundamental levers towards a successful practice of liberation.

  • Queering, by Natacha Roussel
  • Nomadic Family, by Natacha Roussel
  • Self-Sufficiency, by Pauline Gadea
  • Collective Validation, by ginger coons
  • Transdisciplinarity, by Mélanie Dulong de Rosnay
  • Resilient Networks, by Jean-Noel Montagné
  • Reconciliation, by hellekin, Natacha Roussel, and Pauline Gadea
  • Beyond Capitalism
  • Cost of Freedom
  • Queering
